commit.message:
re PR target/8972 ([arc-7-elf] the c code ' x << i' causes infinite loop when i = 0)

2005-09-06  Saurabh Verma  <saurabh.verma@codito.com>

        PR target/8972
        * config/arc/arc.c (output_shift): Add check for loop count when
        optimizing.

From-SVN: r103971
